subject: Question about Haptic reactors with my pedals setup
description_text:
Hi,

I just purchased the SIMSONN PLUS X Sim Racing Pedals, which contains the brake and throttle pedals only (no clutch). Will the VAM pro 2cps work for this setup? When looking at the fittings, it seems to be for the clutch and throttle/break? So I'm not sure if  this is the right thing. Or do I have to buy the 3 pcs? But since I don't have the clutch, it seems like a waste of money. Please clarify or make new recommendations.
Thanks,
Sebastien

conversations.body_text: Hi Sebastien Prompt,    Please don't worry, you can purchase the VAM pro 2cps and we will also throw in three pedal stands. Also, you can provide the order number.
